Vmart.name: V-Mart
Vmart.desc: V-Mart is an Online E-commerece website used to sell groceriers ,fruits and many more ...

meta.maindesc: V-Mart is an Online E-commerece website used to sell groceriers ,fruits and many more ...

PlaylistPilot.name: PlaylistPilot
PlaylistPilot.desc: PlaylistPilot is a Music Organizer web application. It is based on TAG system, it allow user to create, modify playlist on the basis of TAGS

meta.maindesc: PlaylistPilot is a Music Organizer web application. It is based on TAG system, it allows user to create, modify playlist on the basis of TAGS.This application makes it easy to sort through large music libraries.

CrimeMapping.name: Crime Mapping
CrimeMapping.desc: Created a website for Police to track crime record visually on Map, based on the previous crime.

meta.maindesc: Created a website for Police to track crime record visually on Map, based on the previous crime. It maps crime on the basis of previous FIR details

QRMS.name: Quarterly Report Management System (QRMS)
QRMS.desc: QRMS is a web application for college,it is used to generate quarterly report on the basis of data submitted by Teachers, Students etc..

meta.maindesc: QRMS is a web application for college,it is used to generate quarterly report on the basis of data submitted by Teachers, Students etc. Hence it reduces the manual work by automatically generating quarterly report.

Chatapp.name: ChatApp
Chatapp.desc: This is a chat application based on flutter and firebase

meta.maindesc: This is a chat application based on flutter and firebase

ExpenseTracker.name: Expense Tracker
ExpenseTracker.desc: This application helps you keep track of your Expenses and Income.

meta.maindesc: This application helps you keep track of your Expenses and Income. It gets the data from the Bank transaction SMS. You can analyze your expenses and Income.
